ai-patthana8.27:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.27:1.1_0: for those who don’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana8.27:1.1_1: Not by nakedness arises in excessive principles.
ai-patthana8.27:1.1_2: He doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana8.27:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of livelihood.
ai-patthana8.27:3.1_0: He doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without excessive things, and there arises a cause of reasons.
ai-patthana8.27:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana8.27:4.1_0: ‘... for the sake of all five hundred objects, five hundred objects, namely, this five hundred objects.’ ...
